events.name: PriceQuoteGenerated
events.description: Captures when a new price quote is generated for a sales opportunity.

events.name: PriceQuoteExpired
events.description: Tracks the expiration of price quotes after a defined period.

events.name: PriceQuoteAccepted
events.description: Records when a client accepts a price quote.

events.name: PriceQuoteRejected
events.description: Records when a client rejects a price quote.

events.name: CustomerInquiryReceived
events.description: Tracks when a potential customer makes an inquiry regarding pricing.

events.name: AdjustmentRequested
events.description: Captures requests for adjustments on existing quotes.

commands.name: GeneratePriceQuote
commands.description: Captures when a new price quote is generated for a sales opportunity.

commands.name: ExpirePriceQuote
commands.description: Tracks the expiration of price quotes after a defined period.

commands.name: AcceptPriceQuote
commands.description: Records when a client accepts a price quote.

commands.name: RejectPriceQuote
commands.description: Records when a client rejects a price quote.

commands.name: ReceiveCustomerInquiry
commands.description: Tracks when a potential customer makes an inquiry regarding pricing.

commands.name: RequestAdjustment
commands.description: Captures requests for adjustments on existing quotes.

integrationPoints.name: PricingService
integrationPoints.description: Integrates with an external pricing service for real-time price updates.

integrationPoints.name: CustomerManagementSystem
integrationPoints.description: Integrates with a system managing customer details and interactions.
